DataSourcePortable.Name: FN_MOVIMENTACOES.TOTAIS.OPERACAO
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT OP.NOME,
 MOV.LANCAMENTOTESOURARIA,
 SUM(MOV.VALORTOTAL) VALORTOTAL
 FROM FN_MOVIMENTACOES MOV
 JOIN GN_OPERACOES OP ON(OP.HANDLE = MOV.OPERACAO)
 GROUP BY OP.NOME,
 MOV.LANCAMENTOTESOURARIA 
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <Field Alias="LANCAMENTOTESOURARIA" From="A" Path="LANCAMENTOTESOURARIA" /> <Field Alias="VALORTOTAL" From="A" Path="VALORTOTAL" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
